mapper.select: select r.rno ,r.username, r.category, r.message, r.re_date, r.re_time, r.re_state, m.hos_id from reserve r, member m where r.hos_id = m.hos_id and r.re_date = to_char((sysdate),'YYYY-mm-dd')and m.hos_id =#{hos_id} order by r.re_date, r.re_time
mapper.update: update reserve set re_state = #{re_state} ,eat_cnt=#{eat_cnt}, medicine =#{medicine} where rno=#{rno} and username=#{username} and hos_id=#{hos_id}
mapper.insert: insert into event (ENO, hos_id, e_subject, e_content, e_type , e_price) VALUES(event_seq.nextval,#{hos_id},#{e_subject},#{e_content},#{e_type},#{e_price})
